title: Refine pre-meditation and meditation page UI controls

requirements.text: Reduce the height of the Begin Meditation and Save Ritual buttons proportionally on the pre-meditation page so they are appropriately sized when stacked in single column layout

quotes: They seem way too big in height, make them equally smaller proportionally and appropriately

acceptanceCriteria: Button heights are visibly smaller than current implementation
Proportions remain consistent when buttons wrap to single column
Buttons maintain readability and touch-friendly sizing

requirements.text: Add a dynamic title to the meditation guide container on the pre-meditation page that corresponds to the selected meditation type (e.g., 'Meditation Guide', 'Mindfulness Guide', 'Metta Guide', 'Visualization Guide', 'IFS Guide')

quotes: Just meditation guide, or corresponding title, like Mindfulness Guide etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Title displays above or within the meditation guide container
Title text matches the selected meditation type
Title updates dynamically when meditation type changes

requirements.text: Add a semi-transparent background to the play/pause button on the meditation page using the app's main theme color, and implement a subtle hover glow effect

quotes: The color that fits the app theme, similar to main color

acceptanceCriteria: Play/pause button has a visible semi-transparent background
Background color matches the app's primary theme color
Hover state shows a subtle glow effect
Button remains easily visible and accessible

requirements.text: Reduce the height of the time control and volume control input containers on the meditation page to make them more compact

quotes: containers that hold control inputs, that of time control input, and volume control input, they are too big in height
They seem way too big in height, make them equally smaller proportionally and appropriately

acceptanceCriteria: Control containers have visibly reduced height

requirements.text: Fix the time control slider on the meditation page so it responds correctly: dragging left decreases time and dragging right increases time

quotes: time control input itself, are responding visually in reverse order, I as a user drag it to the left side, it goes to right, and vice versa

acceptanceCriteria: Dragging slider handle left decreases the time value
Dragging slider handle right increases the time value
Visual indicator moves in the same direction as user drag

constraints: Maintain all existing functionality on both pre-meditation and meditation pages
Keep the 'More Details' button centered at the bottom of the meditation guide container
Preserve the existing structure of the pre-meditation page
Do not modify the time and volume control functionality, only visual presentation
nonGoals: Changing the overall layout structure of either page
Modifying control functionality beyond visual corrections
